title: Timetable adjustments for improved travel between Ararat and Ballarat
articleContent:
From Sunday 11 July 2021, the timetable for six V/Line coach routes will change to maintain reliable connections with the adjusted train timetable on the Ararat line.

Dimboola - Ballarat

Ballarat - Ararat

Ararat – Horsham

Horsham to Ararat

Ararat to Dimboola

Halls Gap to Stawell

Weekend coach timetables will also be adjusted to give passengers a better spread of services and an improved range of travel options.

Ballarat to Ararat weekend services

Ararat to Ballarat weekend services

To plan your journey, visit the Journey planner or order a printed copy of a timetable by calling 1800 800 007.
